name: DNS_HOSTNAME
notes: E1.37-2. This the host-specific part (or "label") of an internet host; it is prepended to the domain name using a dot ('.') to create a fully qualified domain name (FQDN).

get_response.name: hostname
get_response.notes: Some implementations don't support negative lookbehind in patterns. Alternative patterns without negative lookahead: "^([a-zA-Z0-9]|[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])$", "^[a-zA-Z0-9]([a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?$".
